channel.title: How to make an item 1 handed,need help please!
channel.description: How can i make an item weapon 1 handed instead of 2 handed? I've been googling and only find topics named "making an item 2handed","how can i make an item 2handed?",etc...

item.title: How to make an item 1 handed,need help please!
item.dc:creator: @MrFun MrFun
item.description:
@MrFun wrote:

[quote=“imback4more, post:10, topic:535570”][quote author=MrFun link=topic=654377.msg4383468#msg4383468 date=1384380540]
Is his question wanting the primal 2h one handed?
if so just change/ remove this

[/quote]

I already did that,look at the first picture somewhere in my post,you can see my p2h and shield together.But i want it to look like the primal rapier,the way it faces,just straight forward instead of pointing up.[/quote]
lol i had that problem along time ago I had to define the 2hs/godswords, the ids, in my client, but I was using a delta. find a weapon that unequips the shield after its being wielded and go find where that items id is at.

Also as I said you have to undefind the primal 2h as a 2h in your client to make it face forward…thats what it looks like when i don’t define a 2h sword when its suppose to be a 2h sword

Read full topic

item.title: How to make an item 1 handed,need help please!
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Null Amount:

Just think about it logically based on what sk8r just said. If the code he posted makes all items with “godsword” in its name become two-handed, then what code should you remove?

I can’t stress ^ enough…

Read your code again, OP, look at the itemName.contains(""), that means if an item has a name with the following words (or letters in some cases), it will return true as a 2 handed.

item.title: How to make an item 1 handed,need help please!
item.dc:creator: @imback4more imback4more
item.description:
@imback4more wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:5, topic:535570”]Dude, you missed a part here…

if (itemName.contains(“godsword”)

Returns true, meaning regardless of below, all items with “godsword” in the name will return true…[/quote]

WHERE’S THE F*KI GUN!!! Sorry for my inappropriate language…

How can i make my ags and primal 2h look like my rapier like this?

[URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/198/vpz.PNG/][/URL]

[URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/820/gcrz.png/][/URL]

item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Dude, you missed a part here…

[b]if (itemName.contains("godsword")[/b]
Returns true, meaning regardless of below, all items with "godsword" in the name will return true..

Read full topic
item.source: How to make an item 1 handed,need help please!

item.title: How to make an item 1 handed,need help please!
item.dc:creator: @imback4more imback4more
item.description:
@imback4more wrote:

sk8rdude461:

Search the item id in your server source files, chances are it’ll show up in ItemHandler, or something similar. There’ll be something like a boolean that’s named like “is2Handed” or etc. Remove the id of choice from that code.

Yea tried that,still don’t work.

[code] /**
*two handed weapon check
**/
public boolean is2handed(String itemName, int itemId) {
if(itemName.contains(“ahrim”) || itemName.contains(“karil”) || itemName.contains(“verac”) || itemName.contains(“guthan”) || itemName.contains(“dharok”) || itemName.contains(“torag”)) {
return true;
}
if(itemName.contains(“longbow”) || itemName.contains(“shortbow”) || itemName.contains(“ark bow”)) {
return true;
}
if(itemName.contains(“crystal”) || itemName.contains(“maul”) || itemName.contains(“cannon”)) {
return true;
}
if (itemName.contains(“godsword”) || itemName.contains(“claw”) || itemName.contains(“aradomin sword”) || itemName.contains(“2h”) || itemName.contains(“spear”)){
return true;
}
if (itemName.contains(“zaryte”)) {
return true;
}
switch(itemId) {
case 6724: // seercull
case 11730:
case 4153:
case 6528:
case 10887:
case 14484:

		return true;

}
return false;
}[/code]

Tried adding the ags.

[code] /**
*two handed weapon check
**/
public boolean is2handed(String itemName, int itemId) {
if(itemName.contains(“ahrim”) || itemName.contains(“karil”) || itemName.contains(“verac”) || itemName.contains(“guthan”) || itemName.contains(“dharok”) || itemName.contains(“torag”)) {
return true;
}
if(itemName.contains(“longbow”) || itemName.contains(“shortbow”) || itemName.contains(“ark bow”)) {
return true;
}
if(itemName.contains(“crystal”) || itemName.contains(“maul”) || itemName.contains(“cannon”)) {
return true;
}
if (itemName.contains(“godsword”) || itemName.contains(“claw”) || itemName.contains(“aradomin sword”) || itemName.contains(“2h”) || itemName.contains(“spear”)){
return true;
}
if (itemName.contains(“zaryte”)) {
return true;
}
switch(itemId) {
case 6724: // seercull
case 11730:
case 4153:
case 6528:
case 10887:
case 14484:
case 11694:

		return true;
	}

return false;
}[/code]

tried adding the 11694 to the return true,doesn’t work,ofc.Then tried adding the the return false I get this.

[code]
title ********* Server Compiling!

src\server\model\items\ItemAssistant.java:1326: error: orphaned case
case 11694:
^
1 error
pause
Press any key to continue . . .[/code]

I get 1 error called orphaned case,what’s that? Also where am i to add the case 11694 ?

Read full topic
